      • main

        public boolean main()
        Main method to display while logging in If the user's input is not valid, ask them to enter again or exit
        Returns:
        boolean return true if user has logged in successfully

      • verify

        public boolean verify()
        Verifying an user's logging in (admin/movie goer) by checking with the database
        Returns:
        boolean return true if user has been verified based on the email and password entered
